title: Looking for These OR A T206 Reds Player w/ Cycle Back

posts.post_title: Looking for These OR A T206 Reds Player w/ Cycle Back
posts.post_content:
Like the 80's "legend" Lionel Richie, I too am searching for something. These cards to be exact.

I missed out on these two cards on ebay not too long ago. I'd be willing to trade or pay a premium for the two if anyone on this forum are in possession of these cards and are willing to sell.

- Harry Gasper Cycle 350 PSA 2.5 (sold on ebay 8/16/14)

- Mike Donlin Fielding Hindu SGC 20 (sold on ebay 10/5/14)



Thanks!
Ben
u can for see the future? you can predict what a card will sell for in 2015? impressive

I'm still on the lookout for these two cards. If anyone has them and is willing to sell let me know. Thanks! :D
New Years Bump. Still looking for these two...or if anyone is willing to sell a T206 Reds Player with a Cycle back.
